name: Siterobot
tag_list: buy-website, sell-websites, website-flipping, escrow, monetization, fan-page, established-website, premium-domains, domain-investment, profitable-websites, website-marketplace, domain-marketplace, application-marketplace
overview: Siterobot is a website marketplace. It is considered to be a kind of vertical platform of auction based online markets that is known with Ebay over the World. Additionally, domains, internet projects, fan pages, and mobile applications are traded at this market. Private sale is another method in Siterobot. Siterobot is designed for web masters and investors. Persons and companies may also buy products for their requirements . Escrow service is a valuable feature of Siterobot. Siterobot keeps on servicing until delivery of website information to buyers and receiving the product fee by the seller. After a deal agreement between buyer and seller , the buyer deposits funds to the Siterobot Escrow Account. The seller is supposed to send website’s information providing ownership such as user hosting user name and passwords. The buyer receieves all information which may change according to website content and inclusion. The buyer has to approve to transfer the money to the sellers Siterobot financial user account from the Siterobot escrow account. All these transactions are completed by using only Siterobot. Siterobot targets to reach users globally with its English Language structure and currency option. Moreover, Turkish Language option will be started to serve for Turkish users soon.
